sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.INTERFACE_ID ,A.TRANSACTION_ID ,A.SEGMENT_ID ,A.UNIT_ID ,A.SEQ_NUMBER ,A.IWR_BLLG_CNT_INFO_TXT FROM NACI0040_01 A WHERE A.INTERFACE_ID = #intfcId# AND A.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.INTERFACE_ID ASC ,A.TRANSACTION_ID ASC ,A.SEGMENT_ID ASC ,A.UNIT_ID ASC ,A.SEQ_NUMBER ASC
